Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm developing this RCS booster, and I've looked around a fair bit and haven't really found any tutorials for doing RCS .cfg files. Naturally, I copied one of Squad's and started editing it, but I've hit a wall. I want to make the thruster use both MonoPropellant and Liquid Fuel, but I'm unsure of how. I also have no idea how AtmosphereCurve works for RCS, because it seems like nobody ever makes their own RCS modules I:

The sooner you can help, the better.

Thanks in advance!

atmisoherCurve works the same for RCS as for engines. So do PROPELLANT nodes.

However, the stock ModuleRCS has a bug where it can't handle multiple thrust transforms (i.e. multiple nozzles) when PROPELLANT nodes are used. You can use ModuleRCSFX instead.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92290-0-24-2-ModuleRCSFX-v3-0-8-29-14

looking at the config file it doesn't look like propellant works the same, in engines you have the PROPELLANT module, but in RCS it has a Resource property. Does that mean I can use the PROPELLANT module in RCS too?
